structural_unit_name.en: Department of Translation and Interpretation Studies

name.en: Department of Translation and Interpretation Studies

description.en: During the course we will look at how machine translation systems work and how they have changed over time, what their most common mistakes are, how to evaluate the quality of a machine-translated text and how to edit it to achieve different purposes.
description.et: Kursusel käsitletakse masintõlke arengut ja toimimist, masintõlkesüsteemide tüüpvigu ning masintõlgitud tekstide kvaliteedi hindamist ja nende tekstide toimetamist erinevate eesmärkide jaoks.

objectives.en: Given the growth in machine translation usage in the market for language and translation services, the aim of the course is to prepare translators who are able to fulfil the new roles that have been created in the sector during the last years thanks to the improvements in machine translation, and are able to adapt quickly to new systems and resources developed for their specialty and include them into their work
objectives.et: Lähtudes masintõlke järjest laialdasema kasutuse suunas liikuva tõlketeenuste turu ootustest, on kursuse eesmärk valmistada ette tõlkijaid, kes suudaksid täita uusi rolle, mille masintõlke areng on viimastel aastatel keeleteenuste sektoris loonud, ning kes oskaksid kiiresti kohaneda tõlkimiseks arendatavate uute süsteemidega ja ressurssidega ning neid parimal viisil enda töös kasutada.

learning_outcomes.en: After successful completion of the course, the student:
- can describe the history and development of machine translation and the problems connected to it;
learning_outcomes.et: - kirjeldab masintõlke ajalugu ja arengut ning sellega seotud probleeme;

learning_outcomes.en: - knows the most common mistakes made by different kinds of machine  translation systems;
learning_outcomes.et: - tunneb ära erinevate masintõlkesüsteemide tüüpilisemad vead;

learning_outcomes.en: - can evaluate the quality of different machine-translated texts;
learning_outcomes.et: - annab hinnangu erinevate masintõlgitud tekstide kvaliteedile;

learning_outcomes.en: - is accustomed to the post-editing of machine-translated texts for different purposes, following the principles of either light post-editing of full post-editing;
learning_outcomes.et: - on vilunud masintõlgitud tekstide järeltoimetamises erisugusteks eesmärkideks, rakendades kas osalise või täieliku järeltoimetamise põhimõtteid;

learning_outcomes.en: - can put together instructions for the editing of machine-translated texts.
